resultset.statement: select COUNT(log.behavior_chat_log_id) urlNum,'1' as date_type FROM behavior_chat_log log LEFT JOIN behavior_chat_audit audit ON log.chat_audit_id = audit.chat_audit_id WHERE audit.app_pkg_name ='com.tencent.mm' AND log.content_type = 1 AND log.talk_type = 1 AND log.chat_time >= CURDATE() Union select COUNT(log.behavior_chat_log_id) urlNum,'2' as date_type FROM behavior_chat_log log LEFT JOIN behavior_chat_audit audit ON log.chat_audit_id = audit.chat_audit_id WHERE audit.app_pkg_name ='com.tencent.mm' AND log.content_type = 1 AND log.talk_type = 1 AND log.chat_time >= DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL - 6 DAY) Union select COUNT(log.behavior_chat_log_id) urlNum,'3' as date_type FROM behavior_chat_log log LEFT JOIN behavior_chat_audit audit ON log.chat_audit_id = audit.chat_audit_id WHERE audit.app_pkg_name ='com.tencent.mm' AND log.content_type = 1 AND log.talk_type = 1 AND log.chat_time > DATE_ADD( CURDATE(), INTERVAL - (DAYOFMONTH(CURDATE()) - 1) DAY ) Union select COUNT(log.behavior_chat_log_id) urlNum,'4' as date_type FROM behavior_chat_log log LEFT JOIN behavior_chat_audit audit ON log.chat_audit_id = audit.chat_audit_id WHERE audit.app_pkg_name ='com.tencent.mm' AND log.content_type = 1 AND log.talk_type = 1 AND log.chat_time > DATE_ADD( DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL - 2 MONTH), INTERVAL - (DAYOFMONTH(CURDATE()) - 1) DAY )
